Housewife Robbers Housewife Robbers

Four armed robbery suspects were on Saturday evening shot dead by a Lagos house wife at Alli Dada Street, Ago in Okota area of Lagos. Four armed robbery suspects were on Saturday evening shot dead by a Lagos house wife at Alli Dada Street, Ago in Okota area of Lagos.

According to eye-witness ac- count, the housewife (name withheld), was trailed by the rob- bers to her Alli Dada Street residence, where she occupied a duplex at about 7 pm. According to eye-witness ac- count, the housewife (name withheld), was trailed by the rob- bers to her Alli Dada Street residence, where she occupied a duplex at about 7 pm.

ordered her to surrender her white Mercedez Benz (V-Boot). - ordered her to surrender her white Mercedez Benz (V-Boot). -

She complied but begged the robbers to allow her carry her eight month old baby and a bag containing baby things. The rob- bers agreed after which they jumped into the car and attempted to drive away. She complied but begged the robbers to allow her carry her eight month old baby and a bag containing baby things. The rob- bers agreed after which they jumped into the car and attempted to drive away.

The lady came up with a short machinegun from the bag (the type used by mobile police) and opened fire on the robbers, emptying the entire magazine on them and kill- ing the four men while damaging her car in the process. FCDA Sacks 382 - Nurses Protest FCDA Sacks 382 - Nurses Protest

About 500 nurses took to the street this morning in Abuja in protest against the sack of some of their colleagues by the Federal Capital Development Au- thority PCDA. About 500 nurses took to the street this morning in Abuja in protest against the sack of some of their colleagues by the Federal Capital Development Au- thority PCDA.

Last Friday the authorities of the FCDA (FCT) sacked 382 of its staffers in what it called radonalisation. While the nurses alleged that Abuja minister Lt. Gen. Jerry Useni carried out the retrenchment exercise to pave way for his cronies, the minister said most of the people sacked were non-performers with bad records. Last Friday the authorities of the FCDA (FCT) sacked 382 of its staffers in what it called radonalisation. While the nurses alleged that Abuja minister Lt. Gen. Jerry Useni carried out the retrenchment exercise to pave way for his cronies, the minister said most of the people sacked were non-performers with bad records.
